div.p: I’ve made a lot of friends due to my job actually, I wouldn’t count myself as the most social person and it’s helped me socially open up and I’d say
a lot of people I’ve met in the tea room have become friends and staff have become friends as well and it’s really enhanced my social life and there are
very little down sides outside of work. I’m due a knee replacement so health-wise it’s very physical, we are an upstairs downstairs restaurant so
there’s a flight of stairs in between, it can get very physical, you know I think I once counted we did 7 miles walking in the shop in one day which is crazy
and especially if you’ve got bad knees so physically it’s not great but anyhow I think any job you enter these days you need to be quite fit and healthy to do it.
